title: Kullanari Kootam Lyrics Naalu Perukku Nalladhuna Edhuvum Thapilla Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kullanari Kootam Song Lyrics 
Naalu Perukku Nalladhuna Edhuvum
Singer(s):Anirudh Ravichander, M.C.Rude, Velmurugan

Vanakkam Makkalae
ellaarum thayaar aayikkonga
summa majaava tukkeraa
bayangaramaa
paattu vara pogudhu

kullanari koottam onnu
thittam podudhu.
kollayila kodi panam
kotta pogudhu.

naekkaa padu soakkaa
thirudura kaavaali.
kooththaa theru kooththaa
kalakkura komaali.

noagaama ninnu
thinnura.
kadhoram poova
suththura. (2)

machi..

machi semma tukker
planning-u
..
just like that gaming-u
...
life nalla sahpingu
adichu dhool kalappu
kalakkurom ippo
idhuthaan enga paattu.

yes, idhu podhum ini
no more explanation
just sit back and watch us
we get into ration

idhukkuthaaney pottom
komaali vesam
pada pada vendru
velai mudiththu
kada kada vendru
kaasai eduthu
thadam theriyaama escape-u

naalu peru 
onnaa serndhaa theeney
team work-u.
life-ula idhu pola illa
sema geththu.
thaeva oru luck-ku

noagaama ninnu
thinnura.
kadhoram poova
suththura. 

machi
pa pa paa paa
paa paa (4)
